remarks: The identity morphism in the functor category.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fucid.q $e |- Q = ( C FuncCat D ) $.
fucid.i $e |- I = ( Id ` Q ) $.
fucid.1 $e |- .1. = ( Id ` D ) $.
fucid.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func D ) ) $.
fucid $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` F ) = ( .1. o. ( 1st ` F ) ) ) $.
